languages.text: "Я пришел к тем же выводам. Саргона никогда не покушался на слишком большие куски: десятину Райкада ему было не проглотить — на него охотились бы не только Арбитес, но и преступники, желающие растащить подать на части. Саргона действовал по чьей-то указке и не боялся следствий".

"I have arrived at the same conclusion. Sargona never bit off more than he could chew. Rykad's tithe was too big a prize for him — he would have been targeted both by the Arbites and by any criminals looking to scavenge the shipment piece by piece. Sargona was acting on someone's directive, without fear of the consequences."
languages.original_text: "Я пришел к тем же выводам. Саргона никогда не покушался на слишком большие куски: десятину Райкада ему было не проглотить — на него охотились бы не только Арбитес, но и преступники, желающие растащить подать на части. Саргона действовал по чьей-то указке и не боялся следствий".

traits.locale_text: "I have arrived at the same conclusion. Sargona never bit off more than he could chew. Rykad's tithe was too big a prize for him — he would have been targeted both by the Arbites and any criminals looking to scavenge the shipment apart piece by piece. Sargona was acting on someone's directive, without fear of the consequences."

"I have arrived at the same conclusion. Sargona never bit off more than he could chew. Rykad's tithe was too big a prize for him — he would have been targeted both by the Arbites and any criminals looking to scavenge the shipment apart piece by piece. Sargona was acting on someone's directive, without fear of the consequences."

"I have arrived at the same conclusion. Sargona never bit off more than he could chew. Rykad's tithe was too big a prize for him — he would have been targeted both by the Arbites and by any criminals looking to scavenge the shipment piece by piece. Sargona was acting on someone's directive, without fear of the consequences."

"I have arrived at the same conclusion. Sargona never bit off more than he could chew. Rykad's tithe was too big a prize for him — he would have been targeted both by the Arbites and by any criminals looking to scavenge the shipment piece by piece. Sargona was acting on someone's directive, without fear of the consequences."

"I have arrived at the same conclusion. Sargona never bit off more than he could chew. Rykad's tithe was too big a prize for him — he would have been targeted both by the Arbites and by any criminals looking to scavenge the shipment piece by piece. Sargona was acting on someone's directive, without fear of the consequences."

"I have arrived at the same conclusion. Sargona never bit off more than he could chew. Rykad's tithe was too big a prize for him — he would have been targeted both by the Arbites and by any criminals looking to scavenge the shipment piece by piece. Sargona was acting on someone's directive, without fear of the consequences."

languages.text: 「私も同じ結論にたどり着きました。サルゴナは、身の丈以上のことには決して手を出さない男でした。ライカドの租税は、彼にとっては大きすぎる獲物でした。高等裁定局からも、積荷を一つずつかすめ取ろうとする犯罪者たちからも狙われるでしょうから。つまりサルゴナは、誰かの指示を受けて動いていたんです。結果を恐れることなく」
languages.original_text: "I have arrived at the same conclusion. Sargona never bit off more than he could chew. Rykad's tithe was too big a prize for him — he would have been targeted both by the Arbites and by any criminals looking to scavenge the shipment piece by piece. Sargona was acting on someone's directive, without fear of the consequences."

traits.locale_text: 「私も同じ結論にたどり着きました。サルゴナは、身の丈以上のことには決して手を出さない男でした。ライカドの租税は、彼にとっては大きすぎる獲物でした。高等裁定局からも、積荷を一つずつかすめ取ろうとする犯罪者たちからも狙われるでしょうから。つまりサルゴナは、誰かの指示を受けて動いていたんです。結果を恐れることなく」

languages.text: "Zur selben Schlussfolgerung bin ich auch gelangt. Sargona hat bislang noch nie den Mund zu voll genommen. Rykads Zehnt war eine Nummer zu groß für ihn – er wäre das Ziel des Arbites und aller Verbrecher geworden, die die Lieferung Stück für Stück plündern wollten. Sargona hat also im Auftrag gehandelt, ohne Furcht vor Konsequenzen."
languages.original_text: "I have arrived at the same conclusion. Sargona never bit off more than he could chew. Rykad's tithe was too big a prize for him — he would have been targeted both by the Arbites and by any criminals looking to scavenge the shipment piece by piece. Sargona was acting on someone's directive, without fear of the consequences."

traits.locale_text: "Zur selben Schlussfolgerung bin ich auch gelangt. Sargona hat bislang noch nie den Mund zu voll genommen. Rykads Zehnt war eine Nummer zu groß für ihn – er wäre das Ziel des Arbites und aller Verbrecher geworden, die die Lieferung Stück für Stück plündern wollten. Sargona hat also im Auftrag gehandelt, ohne Furcht vor Konsequenzen."

languages.text: « J'en suis arrivé à la même conclusion. Sargona n'est pas du genre à se laisser aveugler par l'ambition. La dîme de Rykad aurait été un trop gros larcin pour lui. Il se serait retrouvé pourchassé par l'Arbites et tous les autres criminels de la région. Sargona a agi sur l'ordre de quelqu'un d'autre et sans craindre les conséquences. »
languages.original_text: "I have arrived at the same conclusion. Sargona never bit off more than he could chew. Rykad's tithe was too big a prize for him — he would have been targeted both by the Arbites and by any criminals looking to scavenge the shipment piece by piece. Sargona was acting on someone's directive, without fear of the consequences."

traits.locale_text: « J'en suis arrivé à la même conclusion. Sargona n'est pas du genre à se laisser aveugler par l'ambition. La dîme de Rykad aurait été un trop gros larcin pour lui. Il se serait retrouvé pourchassé par l'Arbites et tous les autres criminels de la région. Sargona a agi sur l'ordre de quelqu'un d'autre et sans craindre les conséquences. »

languages.text: «Yo he llegado a la misma conclusión. Sargona nunca mordía más de lo que podía masticar. El diezmo de Rykad era un botín demasiado goloso; se le habrían echado encima tanto el Arbites como otros criminales dispuestos a expoliar hasta el último gramo del cargamento. No, Sargona siguió las órdenes de otra persona sin temor a las consecuencias».
languages.original_text: "I have arrived at the same conclusion. Sargona never bit off more than he could chew. Rykad's tithe was too big a prize for him — he would have been targeted both by the Arbites and by any criminals looking to scavenge the shipment piece by piece. Sargona was acting on someone's directive, without fear of the consequences."

traits.locale_text: «Yo he llegado a la misma conclusión. Sargona nunca mordía más de lo que podía masticar. El diezmo de Rykad era un botín demasiado goloso; se le habrían echado encima tanto el Arbites como otros criminales dispuestos a expoliar hasta el último gramo del cargamento. No, Sargona siguió las órdenes de otra persona sin temor a las consecuencias».

languages.text: “我也得出了同样的结论。萨戈纳根本不是那种贪多嚼不烂的人，而莱卡德的什一税这个目标实在太大，他根本消化不了。如果他真的劫走了什一税，到时候追杀他的不仅会有帝国法务部，还有其他觊觎什一税的罪犯。萨戈纳肯定是在按照某个人的命令行事，不计后果。”
languages.original_text: "I have arrived at the same conclusion. Sargona never bit off more than he could chew. Rykad's tithe was too big a prize for him — he would have been targeted both by the Arbites and by any criminals looking to scavenge the shipment piece by piece. Sargona was acting on someone's directive, without fear of the consequences."

traits.locale_text: “我也得出了同样的结论。萨戈纳根本不是那种贪多嚼不烂的人，而莱卡德的什一税这个目标实在太大，他根本消化不了。如果他真的劫走了什一税，到时候追杀他的不仅会有帝国法务部，还有其他觊觎什一税的罪犯。萨戈纳肯定是在按照某个人的命令行事，不计后果。”

languages.text: "Ben de aynı sonuca vardım. Ancak Sargona, boyundan bu denli büyük bir işe asla kalkışmaz. Rykad'ın aşarı, Sargona için aşırı büyük bir mükâfat. Hem Yargıcıların hem de sevkiyatı parça parça yağmalamak isteyen suçluların doğrudan hedefi olma tehlikesiyle karşı karşıya kalmak demek bu. Sargona, birinin talimatıyla hamlelerinin sonuçlarını düşünmeden hareket etti."
languages.original_text: "I have arrived at the same conclusion. Sargona never bit off more than he could chew. Rykad's tithe was too big a prize for him — he would have been targeted both by the Arbites and by any criminals looking to scavenge the shipment piece by piece. Sargona was acting on someone's directive, without fear of the consequences."

traits.locale_text: "Ben de aynı sonuca vardım. Ancak Sargona boyundan bu denli büyük bir işe asla kalkışmazdı. Rykad'ın aşarı, Sargona için aşırı büyük bir mükâfat. Hem Yargıcıların hem de sevkiyatı parça parça yağmalamak isteyen suçluların doğrudan hedefi olma tehlikesiyle karşı karşıya kalırdı. Sargona, birinin talimatıyla hamlelerinin sonuçlarını düşünmeden hareket ediyordu."

languages.original_text: "I have arrived at the same conclusion. Sargona never bit off more than he could chew. Rykad's tithe was too big a prize for him — he would have been targeted both by the Arbites and by any criminals looking to scavenge the shipment piece by piece. Sargona was acting on someone's directive, without fear of the consequences."
